mainQuest_1.helperText: Speak with the inn owner on the 1st floor

mainQuest_4.helperText: Speak with Feste in front of the storage

mainQuest_5.helperText: Speak with Feste at City Gate Square

mainQuest_8.helperText: Go to the ruins on the cliff in Skyquake Fields

mainQuest_9.helperText: Go to where you woke up

mainQuest_11.helperText: Speak with Jake at the Frontiering Station

mainQuest_12.helperText: Speak with Murrie at the Frontiering Station

mainQuest_13.helperText: Collect 3 unidentified plants at Skyquake Fields

mainQuest_15.helperText: Report to Murrie at the Frontiering Station

mainQuest_22.helperText: Level up Adventurer Rank to 2 (in the main menu)

mainQuest_23.helperText: Speak with Jake after reaching Adventure Rank 2

mainQuest_24.helperText: Meet Jake at Dragon Claw Valley

mainQuest_25.helperText: Defeat the monsters in Dragon Claw Valley

mainQuest_26.helperText: Receive Rewards from Jake at the Frontiering Station

mainQuest_27.helperText: Speak to the Innkeeper of The Double Faced Coin

mainQuest_28.helperText: Ask about visitors at Bapharia Shrine

mainQuest_29.helperText: Go to Minsterhorn in Minster Hills

mainQuest_30.helperText: Search for the priest at the Giant Tower Ruins in Andra Basin

mainQuest_32.helperText: Speak with Feste in Minsterhorn after reaching Adventure Rank 3

mainQuest_33.helperText: Go to the Pillar of Divinity in Divine Haven Hill

mainQuest_34.helperText: Conduct a strategy meeting at Larpal

mainQuest_35.helperText: Speak with the pilgrims at Bergmahl

mainQuest_36.helperText: Present your permission badge to the guard at the Pillar of Divinity

mainQuest_37.helperText: Reach the top of the Pillar

mainQuest_38.helperText: Escort Aerinse and the others to Larpal
